data.title: Compatible Lenses
data.text:
D7500 Online Manual

Technical Notes

Compatible Lenses

Compatible Lenses

Compatible CPU Lenses

Lenses That May Block the Built-in Flash and AF-Assist Illuminator

Compatible Non-CPU Lenses

Compatible CPU Lenses

Nikon recommends CPU lenses (IX Nikkor lenses excluded) and in particular type G, E, and D lenses, which support the full range of features offered by the camera.

Compatible CPU Lenses

(PDF; 41.7 KB)

Lenses That May Block the Built-in Flash and AF-Assist Illuminator

The lenses listed in this section may block the built-in flash or AF-assist illuminator under some conditions.

AF-Assist Illumination

The AF-assist illuminator has a range of about 0.5â3.0 m (1 ft 8 in.â9 ft 10 in.); when using the illuminator, use a lens with a focal length of 18â200 mm. Some lenses may block the illuminator at certain focus distances. Remove lens hoods when using the illuminator.

AF-assist illumination is not available with the following lenses:

AF-S NIKKOR 14â24mm f/2.8G ED

AF-S NIKKOR 200mm f/2G ED VR II

AF-S VR Nikkor 200mm f/2G IF-ED

AF-S VR Zoom-Nikkor 200â400mm f/4G IF-ED

AF-S NIKKOR 200â400mm f/4G ED VR II

AF-S NIKKOR 200â500mm f/5.6E ED VR

At a range of 0.7 m (2 ft 4 in.) or less, the following lenses may block the AF-assist illuminator and interfere with autofocus when lighting is poor:

AF-S Zoom-Nikkor 17â35mm f/2.8D IF-ED

AF-S DX Zoom-Nikkor 17â55mm f/2.8G IF-ED

AF-S DX NIKKOR 18â140mm f/3.5â5.6G ED VR

AF-S DX NIKKOR 18â300mm f/3.5â6.3G ED VR

AF Zoom-Nikkor 20â35mm f/2.8D IF

AF Zoom-Nikkor 24â85mm f/2.8â4D IF

AF-S NIKKOR 24â85mm f/3.5â4.5G ED VR

AF-S VR Zoom-Nikkor 24â120mm f/3.5â5.6G IF-ED

AF-S NIKKOR 35mm f/1.4G

AF Micro-Nikkor 200mm f/4D IF-ED

At a range of 1.0 m (3 ft 4 in.) or less, the following lenses may block the AF-assist illuminator and interfere with autofocus when lighting is poor:

AF-S DX VR Zoom-Nikkor 18â200mm f/3.5â5.6G IF-ED

AF-S NIKKOR 24â70mm f/2.8G ED

AF-S NIKKOR 24â70mm f/2.8E ED VR

AF Zoom-Nikkor 24â120mm f/3.5â5.6D IF

AF-S Zoom-Nikkor 28â70mm f/2.8D IF-ED

AF Zoom Micro Nikkor ED 70â180mm f/4.5â5.6D

AF-S VR Micro-Nikkor 105mm f/2.8G IF-ED

At a range of 1.5 m (4 ft 12 in.) or less, the following lenses may block the AF-assist illuminator and interfere with autofocus when lighting is poor:

AF-S DX NIKKOR 18â300mm f/3.5â5.6G ED VR

AF-S NIKKOR 24â120mm f/4G ED VR

AF-S NIKKOR 28â300mm f/3.5â5.6G ED VR

AF-S DX NIKKOR 55â300mm f/4.5â5.6G ED VR

AF-S NIKKOR 70â200mm f/2.8G ED VR II

AF Zoom-Nikkor 80â200mm f/2.8D ED

At a range of 2.0 m (6 ft 7 in.) or less, the following lenses may block the AF-assist illuminator and interfere with autofocus when lighting is poor:

AF-S VR Zoom-Nikkor ED 70â200mm f/2.8G (IF)

AF-S NIKKOR 70â200mm f/4G ED VR

AF-S Zoom Nikkor ED 80â200mm f/2.8D (IF)

The Built-in Flash

The built-in flash can be used with lenses with focal lengths of 16â300 mm, although in some cases the flash may be unable to entirely light the subject at some ranges or focal lengths due to shadows cast by the lens (see the illustration below), while lenses that block the subjectâs view of the red-eye reduction lamp may interfere with red-eye reduction. Peripheral illumination may drop at focal lengths under 16 mm. Remove lens hoods to prevent shadows.

The flash has a minimum range of about 0.6 m and can not be used in the macro range of macro zoom lenses. When DX (24Ã16) is selected for Choose image area, the flash may be unable to light the entire subject with the following lenses at ranges less than those given below:

Lens Zoom position Minimum distance without vignetting AF-S DX NIKKOR 10â24mm f/3.5â4.5G ED 20 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 24 mm No vignetting AF-S DX Zoom-Nikkor 12â24mm f/4G IF-ED 18 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 20 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 24 mm No vignetting AF-S DX NIKKOR 16â80mm f/2.8â4E ED VR 16 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 24â80 mm No vignetting AF-S DX Zoom-Nikkor 17â55mm f/2.8G IF-ED 24 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 28â55 mm No vignetting AF-S DX NIKKOR 18â140mm f/3.5â5.6G ED VR 18 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 24â140 mm No vignetting

AF-S DX VR Zoom-Nikkor 18â200mm f/3.5â5.6G IF-ED

AF-S DX NIKKOR 18â200mm f/3.5â5.6G ED VR II

18 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 24â200 mm No vignetting AF-S DX NIKKOR 18â300mm f/3.5â5.6G ED VR 28 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 50â300 mm No vignetting AF-S DX NIKKOR 18â300mm f/3.5â6.3G ED VR 35 mm No vignetting AF-S NIKKOR 16â35mm f/4G ED VR 24 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 28 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 35 mm No vignetting AF-S Zoom-Nikkor 17â35mm f/2.8D IF-ED 20 mm 3.0 m/9 ft 11 in. 24 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 28â35 mm No vignetting AF Zoom-Nikkor 18â35mm f/3.5â4.5D IF-ED 18 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 24â35 mm No vignetting AF-S NIKKOR 24â70mm f/2.8G ED 28 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 35 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 50â70 mm No vignetting AF-S NIKKOR 24â70mm f/2.8E ED VR 35 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 50 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 70 mm No vignetting AF-S Zoom-Nikkor 28â70mm f/2.8D IF-ED 28 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 35â70 mm No vignetting AF-S NIKKOR 14â24mm f/2.8G ED When DX (24Ã16) is selected for Choose image area, the flash will be unable to light the entire subject at all ranges.

When 1.3Ã (18Ã12) is selected for Choose image area, the flash may be unable to light the entire subject with the following lenses at ranges less than those given below.

Lens Zoom position Minimum distance without vignetting AF-S DX NIKKOR 10â24mm f/3.5â4.5G ED 15â24 mm No vignetting AF-S DX Zoom-Nikkor 12â24mm f/4G IF-ED 15 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 18â24 mm No vignetting AF-S DX Zoom-Nikkor 17â55mm f/2.8G IF-ED 20 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 24â55 mm No vignetting AF-S DX NIKKOR 18â300mm f/3.5â5.6G ED VR 28 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 50â300 mm No vignetting AF-S NIKKOR 14â24mm f/2.8G ED 24 mm 3.0 m/9 ft 11 in. AF-S NIKKOR 16â35mm f/4G ED VR 20 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 24 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 28â35 mm No vignetting AF-S Zoom-Nikkor 17â35mm f/2.8D IF-ED 17 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 20 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 24â35 mm No vignetting AF-S NIKKOR 24â70mm f/2.8G ED 24 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 28 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 35â70 mm No vignetting AF-S NIKKOR 24â70mm f/2.8E ED VR 28 mm 1.5 m/5 ft 35 mm 1.0 m/3 ft 4 in. 50â70 mm No vignetting

The built-in flash can also be used with the following non-CPU lenses: Nikon Series E and 16â300 mm NIKKOR (AI-S, AI-, and AI-modifed). AI 50â300mm f/4.5, modified AI 50â300mm f/4.5, AI-S 50â300mm f/4.5 ED, and AI 50â300mm f/4.5 ED lenses must be used at a zoom position of 70 mm or above.

Compatible Non-CPU Lenses

Non-CPU lenses may only be used when the camera is in mode M. Selecting another mode disables the shutter release. Aperture must be adjusted manually via the lens aperture ring and the camera metering system, i-TTL flash control, and other features requiring a CPU lens can not be used. Some non-CPU lenses can not be used; see âIncompatible Accessories and Non-CPU Lensesâ (0 Incompatible Accessories and Non-CPU Lenses).
